title: Sonora and the Scroll of Alexandria
description: Searching in the secret guardian base Shangri-La, located in a remote part of the Himalayas, Allora finds information that will lead her toward the true purpose of the Eye of the Titans. It will also awaken a dormant enemy that has been waiting for the right time to strike.At the end of the Rebel Wars, a sleeper agent, code named Hades, wreaked havoc among the rebellion. The information he passed on to King Salazar led to the death of many high ranking agents in the Sonoran Secret Service. With his assassins dead, the king activates Hades. The only way to expose the traitor is to find the one item he covets most. Hades is after an ancient scroll from the lost city of Alexandria, which carries a key piece of information that could lead to the destruction of Earth. Allora will test her limits, face new enemies, and figure out that in the game of secrets, no one is safe.
author: T.S. Hall
